description: Japanese anemone (Anemone hupehensis var. japonica 'Prinz Heinrich') is a stunning and unique flower beloved for its beauty. It stands out in any garden due to its bold pink flowers and long-lasting blooms which start in mid-summer and last through autumn. The ample flower petals are deeply lobed and the clusters of furry stamens add to its charm. Its foliage is also attractive, with delicate, deeply lobed leaves in dark green. This perennial plant will brighten up any garden with its beauty and comes in other varieties with white and red blooms as well. Japanese anemone is easy to look after and soil conditions don't have to be perfect for it to thrive, making it a great choice for any flower enthusiast.
